name: Airvite
overview:
Airvite is a web and mobile invite service focusing on ease of use, allowing you to quickly invite your friends by tapping into your existing social network contacts. It was created by AntÃ³nio Marques and Diogo Alves.

Whether you are going out for lunch with your colleagues or organizing a night out with your friends, Arvite makes it simple. By using your contacts from the most popular social networks and email, Airvite lets you invite all your friends from a single location no matter what service your friends use.

With different Airvite types, you can decide on the meet-up spot yourself, let Airvite surprise you by selecting one of your favorite spots, or put it up for vote by your friends.

Airvite helps you by:

  • bringing all your social network and email contacts together in one place
  • introducing several invite types that help you decide where to meet up
  • allowing you to customize your favorite spots and organizing them into groups
  • providing a mobile app so that you can manage your airvites and receive notifications no matter where you are
